attributes.action: CAROLUS III REX: Petition to Restore Full Latin Titles to the English Coinage.
attributes.additional_details: Restore the natural precedent of numismatic tradition. We are Caroleans! CAROLUS III REX DEI GRATIA FID DEF
attributes.background: The Royal Mint announced on 29 September designs for the new King's specie. They have been met with concern from coin collectors and Royal historians alike. The use of CHARLES III as opposed to CAROLUS III eviscerates 900 years of Britis numismatic tradition and add pig latin to the national coinage

rejection.details:
Coins are manufactured and issued by the Royal Mint, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more here: https://www.royalmint.com/discover/uk-coins/coin-design-and-specifications/.
